sources.title: Eurostat – EU Population Diversity by Citizenship and Country of Birth
sources.description: Data extracted in February 2025, covering migration, foreign-born population, and citizenship.

sources.title: Eurostat – Demography of Europe: 2024 Edition
sources.description: Official demographic data for all EU member states, including population structure and diversity.

sources.title: Statista – Share of Foreign Nationals in EU Member States (2022–2024)
sources.description: Comparative statistics and visuals showing the proportion of foreign nationals in EU countries.
